name: Demos Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fiery End
entries: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magen makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.
